summary: Completed comprehensive testing of financial budget control application. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend UI loads correctly with dark glassmorphism theme. Found critical transaction type bug where income transactions are incorrectly processed as expenses. Charts, navigation, accounts, reports, and mobile responsiveness all working well.

integration_issues.issue: Income transactions are incorrectly saved as expense transactions with negative amounts
integration_issues.details: When creating an income transaction, it gets saved as expense type with negative amount. Both income ($2000) and expense ($150.75) transactions show as red expenses in the list.

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with correct layout and glassmorphism theme
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Accounts, Transactions, Reports)
Charts display data correctly (Pie chart for expenses, Line chart for balance history)
Reports page with date filtering and export buttons (PDF/Excel)
Mobile responsive sidebar with proper open/close functionality
Dark theme implementation with proper color coding
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical transaction type bug: Income transactions are being incorrectly processed and saved as expenses. Check transaction form submission logic and backend transaction creation endpoint to ensure type field is properly handled.
